mappings.name: Get analysis summary for a specific commit - analysisExample

commit-id.description:
The commit identifier.
The commit identifier is included only if the same commit was successfully analyzed for all languages. A detailed breakdown of which commit was analyzed for each language is provided in the `languages` property.

log-url.description: A page on LGTM to view the logs for this analysis.

results-url.description: A page on LGTM to view the results of this analysis.
